mapper.sql: SELECT postId, senderId, receiverId, sendTime, content FROM post_tb
mapper.insert: insert into post_tb(postId, senderId, receiverId, sendTime, content) values (post_seq.nextVal, #{senderId}, #{receiverId}, sysdate, #{content})
mapper.select: WHERE postId = #{postId} ORDER BY sendTime desc
WHERE senderId = #{userId} ORDER BY sendTime desc
WHERE receiverId = #{userId} ORDER BY sendTime desc
